textBeforeTable: For full delivery information please see our Delivery page #delivery_tab p{ padding-top: 5px; padding-bottom: 5px;} #delivery_tab table .price{width:30%} #delivery_tab table .estimated_delivery{width:32%} #delivery_tab table .name{width:38%} #delivery_tab table.next td:first-child{padding-left:12px} #delivery_tab table img{padding-right:10px;width:35px} #delivery_tab table img,#delivery_tab table th,#delivery_tab table td{vertical-align:middle} #delivery_tab table td.empty{display:none} #delivery_tab table th:first-child{padding-left:10px} #delivery_tab table th{font-weight: bold;} #delivery_tab table td,#delivery_tab table th{border-right:1px solid #d6d2ce;border-bottom:1px solid #d6d2ce;font-size:12px;line-height:16px;text-align:left;padding:8px 8px 8px 16px} #delivery_tab table th{text-transform:uppercase;text-align:left;background:#fafaf9;font-weight:normal} #delivery_tab table{border:1px solid #d6d2ce;width:100%;margin-bottom:16px} #delivery_tab .legal_copy{font-size:11px;padding-top:16px;margin-bottom:16px} #delivery_tab a:hover{text-decoration:underline} #delivery_tab a{color:#0ca6d4;cursor:pointer}
textAfterTable: NON-MAINLAND UK estimated delivery price Highlands & Islands of Scotland 2-5 days from dispatch £5.50 surcharge Northern Ireland 2-5 days from dispatch £6.50 surcharge INTERNATIONAL DELIVERY estimated delivery price Europe 3-7 days from dispatch Please call 01423 525750  Frequently bought together Straffe Hendrik £3.99 Add to Cart Left Hand Brewing Widdershins Barley Wine £11.99 Add to Cart Flying Dog Super Tramp
